sections.title: Summary
sections.text: Senior Software Engineer with 10 years of professional experience in both Elixir and C#. Currently serving as the most senior engineer in a ~10 person team, leading architectural decisions and technical direction whilst mentoring and accelerating colleagues. Passionate about maintainable systems, keeping things "delightfully boring." Obsessed with Linux, Nix, and atomic note-taking. Proven track record delivering simple, robust solutions.

Strengthened engineering culture by establishing a book club, actively shaping technical demo processes and taking over coordination for other established ceremonies after senior departure

Technologies: Elixir, Phoenix, Ecto, Typespec, Docker, Kubernetes, Nix, AWS, Google Cloud, Rudderstack, Algolia & Contentful
